pageProps.title: My tools
pageProps.content:
#### These are the tools which I use almost every day

#### 1. Personal productivity
[Things 3](https://culturedcode.com/things), [Google calendar](https://calendar.google.com)

#### 2. Team productivity
[Slack](https://slack.com)

#### 3. Notes
[Workflowy](https://blog.workflowy.com)

#### 4. Programming languages
[JavaScript](https://262.ecma-international.org/12.0), [TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/intro.html)

#### 5. Development
[NeoVim](https://neovim.io), [Tmux](https://github.com/tmux/tmux/wiki/Getting-Started), [Alacritty](https://github.com/alacritty/alacritty/wiki/Keyboard-mappings)

#### 6. Backend
[Node.js](https://nodejs.org/docs/latest-v15.x/api), [Nest.js](https://docs.nestjs.com), [Postgres](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/13/index.html), [Redis](https://redis.io/documentation)

#### 7. Operations
[AWS](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/concepts.html), [Ansible](https://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/index.html), [GitHub Actions](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/guides/about-continuous-integration)

#### 8. Testing
[Jest](https://jestjs.io/docs/api)
